Key Match Events: Kyle McCann hit a two-run homer
Brent Rooker had two hits and two RBIs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros have lost three straight games and their lead in the AL West has narrowed to four games over Seattle with 17 to play
Others: All-Star second baseman Jose Altuve exited after the fifth inning with right side discomfort
Houston also lost All-Star second baseman Jose Altuve, who exited after the fifth inning with right side discomfort
